sent.orig: The company mainly produces plate furniture including office furniture, civil furniture, school furniture and hotel furniture.
sent.trans: 公司主要生产板式家具包括办公家具、民用家具、学校家具和酒店家具。

sent.orig: Furniture, Furniture Fittings and Fixtures, Paintings and Sculpture, Furniture, Furnishings, Sculpture, Carpet and Curtain Furniture.
sent.trans: 采购产品家具，家具配件和设备，画和雕刻，家具，家具，雕刻，地毯和帐家具。

sent.orig: Exhibit: solid wood furniture, dinning room furniture unit, living room furniture unit, hall furniture.
sent.trans: 展品：“米尼斯”实木家具、卧房系列、餐厅系列、客厅系列、书房系列、实木家具部件加工。

sent.orig: Bathroom Accessories, Plastic Furniture, Houseware, Stainless Steel Article, Kitchen Accessories Furniture, Furniture Fittings and Fixtures.
sent.trans: 采购产品浴室配件，塑料家具，家庭用品，不锈钢文章，厨房配件家具，家具配件和设备。

sent.orig: Handicrafts, Furniture, Furniture Fittings and Fixtures, Handcrafted Wooden, Metal Folk, Ethnic Art, Casual Furniture Handicrafts.
sent.trans: 采购产品手工艺品，家具，家具配件及固定装置，手工木制的，金属的民间，民族艺术，休闲家具，手工艺品。
